title: Royal Sonesta Houston Celebrates Three Years With Three-Day Summer Sale; Lock In Luxury And Location From Just $90 During July 14-16 Booking Window
text:
Reprint HOUSTON, July 6, 2015 /PRNewswire/ -- To celebrate its third anniversary mid-month, the acclaimed Royal Sonesta Houston in sought after Uptown is enticing travelers to mark the milestone during a three-day flash sale. From July 14 through 16 , lock in 30-percent off the best available rate and an opportunity to experience nearly $30 million in recent renovations, encompassing luxurious rooms and premium amenities, for as little as $90 per night through August 31. Book online starting July 14 using promo code RHOU3YR. According to General Manager Pete Ells , "We're thrilled to extend an offer that allows locals and visitors to treat themselves to one of the best hotels in the city at an incomparable price. Save on us and splurge on a night or weekend exploring Houston and our premier Galleria area location."From some of the country's top shopping and dining down Westheimer Road and Post Oak Boulevard, including The Galleria and Uptown Park , to miles of hike and bike trails plus kayaking in Memorial Park along picturesque Buffalo Bayou, Royal Sonesta Houston indulges with recreation and entertainment for every taste. Explore nearby and nationally recognized points of interest ranging from Bayou Bend Collection and Gardens and The Beer Can House to Karbach Brewing Co. and the Mahatma Gandhi District, all just minutes away. Make the most of summer travel with upcoming special events including Best Damn Food Food Truck Festival Ever ( July 18 ), Spiked by the Scoop ( July 23 ), Space City Comic Con ( July 24 ), Houston International Jazz Festival ( July 31- August 2 ), White Lines Nights in The Heights ( August 1 ), Houston Shakespeare Festival at Miller Outdoor Theatre ( August 1-9 ), ( Houston Restaurant Weeks ( August 1-31 ) and Habsburg Splendor: Masterpieces from Vienna's Imperial Collections at The Museum of Fine Arts (through September 13 ). Miss the window or traveling into September? The entire U.S. Sonesta portfolio is on sale through Labor Day. Enjoy 25-percent off reservations of two nights or more with the Sonesta Summer Stays package. About Royal Sonesta Houston The 485-room Royal Sonesta Houston is an AAA Four-Diamond-rated, full-service hotel located in the heart of the Galleria area, an upscale business, shopping, dining and entertainment district in Uptown. The modern, 23-story property offers 50,000 square feet of function space, several dining options, a swimming pool and 24-hour fitness facility. Steps away from The Galleria mall and Post Oak Boulevard, it is also situated in close proximity to downtown, Highland Village , Memorial Park, Greenway Plaza, the museum and theater districts and Texas Medical Center. Reservations are available by calling 617.315.9100; toll free at 800.SONESTA or online at www.Sonesta.com .
